title: net: unexpected TCP FIN transmission on dragonfly
body:
I know what I must say at a time like this: RTFM.

% man 4 tcp on dragonfly

TCP_KEEPINTVL
        When the SO_KEEPALIVE option is enabled, TCP sends a
        keepalive probe to the remote system of a connection that
        has been idle for a period of time.  The TCP_KEEPINTVL
        option specifies the number of milliseconds...

milliseconds...
